body:
Comment 3: 
For reference, gccgo reports compile-time errors in all cases for the above program ( 
http://play.golang.org/p/yTnvUtvRfj ):

x.go:3:16: error: string index out of bounds
      _ = "abc"[5]
                ^
x.go:4:27: error: array index out of bounds
      _ = (&[3]int{1,2,3})[5]
                           ^
x.go:5:16: error: string index out of bounds
      _ = "abc"[5:6]
                ^
x.go:5:18: error: string index out of bounds
      _ = "abc"[5:6]
                  ^
x.go:6:27: error: array index out of bounds
      _ = (&[3]int{1,2,3})[5:6]
                           ^
x.go:6:29: error: array index out of bounds
      _ = (&[3]int{1,2,3})[5:6]
